document.full_text: after an assault outside dodger stadium left a giants fan in a coma, team officials and the los angeles police chief delivered on their promise of a 'sea of blue' response.
document.title: new police presence is hard to miss amid dodger blue
lines_and_colors: after an assault outside dodger stadium left a giants fan in a coma, team officials and the los angeles police chief delivered on their promise of a 'sea of blue' response.
